respStmt.name: Craig A. Berry, Martin Mueller, and Clifford Wulfman
Lawrence Berland, Hilary Bina, Katherine Gould, Kreg Segal, Nicholas Terrell

publicationStmt.p: The WordHoard Shakespeare is a joint project of the Perseus Project at Tufts University, The Northwestern University Library, and Northwestern University Academic Technologies. It is derived from The Globe Shakespeare, the one-volume version of the Cambridge Shakespeare, edited by W. G. Clark, J. Glover, and W. A. Wright (1891-3). The Internet Shakespeare editions of the quartos and folios have been consulted to create a modern text that observes as closely as possible the morphological and prosodic practices of the earliest editions. Spellings, especially of contracted and hyphenated forms, have been standardized across the corpus. The text has been fully lemmatized and morphosyntactically tagged.

Â© 2003. The copyright to The WordHoard Shakespeare is owned jointly by Northwestern University and Tufts University. The WordHoard Shakespeare is provided for free solely for non-commercial use by students, scholars, and the public. Any commercial use or publication of it, in whole or in part, without prior written authorization of the copyright holders is strictly prohibited.

castItem.roleDesc: master of the revels to Theseus
queen of the Amazons, betrothed to Theseus
daughter to Egeus, in love with Lysander

castItem.role: Other fairies attending their King and Queen

div.head: Act 1, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, and Attendants.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Enter EGEUS, HERMIA, LYSANDER, and DEMETRIUS.
Exeunt all but Lysander and Hermia.

div.head: Act 1, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter QUINCE, SNUG, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT and STARVELING.

div.head: Act 2, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter, from opposite sides, a FAIRY, and PUCK.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Enter, from one side, OBERON, with his train; from the other, TITANIA, with hers.
Enter OBERON, and squeezes the flower on TITANIA'S eyelids.

div.head: Act 3, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter QUINCE, SNUG, BOTTOM, FLUTE, SNOUT and STARVELING.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Re-enter PUCK, and BOTTOM with an ass's head.

sp.speaker: Quince
sp.stage: Exeunt Quince, Snug, Flute, Snout, and Starveling.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Enter PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH, and MUSTARDSEED.

wordHoardTaggedLine.label: 404I
wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Exit Lysander, as following the voice.
Squeezing the juice on Lysander's eyes.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 1
div.stage: The same. LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS. HELENA, and HERMIA lying asleep.
Enter TITANIA and BOTTOM; PEASEBLOSSOM, COBWEB, MOTH, MUSTARDSEED, and other Fairies attending; OBERON behind unseen.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, EGEUS, and train.
Horns and shouts within. Lys., Dem., Hel., and Her., wake and start up.
Exeunt The., Hip., Ege., and train.

div.head: Act 4, Scene 2
div.stage: Enter QUINCE, FLUTE, SNOUT, and STARVELING.

div.head: Act 5, Scene 1
div.stage: Enter THESEUS, HIPPOLYTA, PHILOSTRATE, Lords, and Attendants.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Enter LYSANDER, DEMETRIUS, HERMIA, and HELENA.

sp.speaker: Theseus
sp.stage: Enter PYRAMUS and THISBE, WALL,MOONSHINE, and LION.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Exeunt Prologue, Pyramus, Thisbe, Lion, and Moonshine.

sp.speaker: Hippolyta
sp.stage: The Lion shakes Thisbe's mantle, and exit.

wordHoardTaggedLine.stage: Enter OBERON and TITANIA wlith their train.
